sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: As COP27 approaches its end, diplomats have not come to an agreement on climate disaster reparations for those most impacted by global warming.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Winter has begun in Ukraine with dropping temperatures, just as 10 million people are without electricity in the latest Russian bombardment.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Eight years after Malaysia Airlines flight MH17 was shot down over Ukraine, a result for the families of the victims as three men are sentenced to life in prison.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Iran is gripped by more deadly violence as security forces continue to crack down on anti-government protests.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The family of a woman who died due to new restrictive abortion rules in Poland speak out at the European Parliament in Brussels.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: With less than 24 hours to go until the end of COP27 in Egypt, diplomats say they are far from reaching the agreement on climate disaster reparations.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Many in the global south have been calling for funding to offset the devastation caused by global warming.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: To establish a loss and damage fund we will consider...

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: We are out of time and we're out of money and we're out of patience.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: We must establish at this COP27 a loss and damage finance facility.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Establish a loss and damage fund will determine the success or failure of our collective leadership here.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Welcomed with a round of applause by Brazilian climate activists, their country's president-elect has called for a restructuring of the UN, arguing that it is biased. The UN needs to change. The UN cannot just stay on the side of the countries that won World War II. We need to have African countries in the Security Council, South American countries, Asian countries.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Richer nations had previously agreed to give 100 billion euros a year to the Global South, a commitment they never kept. And the EU has now proposed a much smaller 1 billion euros for African nations. Timmermans added that the fund could take several years before it could become effective, but solutions need to be faster, even if they fall short of the demands by climate activists.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Around 10 million people in Ukraine are without electricity just as winter sets in. The fresh

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: wave of intense Russian bombardments have targeted crucial power supplies and residential areas. It's reported that at least seven people were killed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The consequences of another missile attack against Ukraine continues all day.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Again, there have been emergency power outages in addition to planned ones.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: As of now, more than 10 million Ukrainians are without electricity.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: addition to planned ones. As of now, more than 10 million Ukrainians are without electricity.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: With dropping temperatures and snow falling in Kyiv, residents are now living without heating.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: However, some in the capital continue to be defiant despite the challenging situation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: I know that the power of belief in us is so strong that we will survive it.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: We will overcome it.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: We can feel it.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: It's foolish to deny that we can't feel it.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: And it's foolish to deny threats that the colder it will get, the greater the risks that the winter in Kyiv will be.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: To put it mildly, it's difficult.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: But there's no doubt we will overcome it.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The Kremlin blames the suffering of civilians on Kyiv's refusal to negotiate.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Over in Kherson, residents are slowly adjusting to their new lives without the Russian military.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: We managed to carry on for many months, almost nine months, I think we will live through the winter. The main thing is to get the electricity back.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, the International Atomic Energy Agency has passed a third resolution, calling on the Kremlin to immediately cease all actions at the Ukrainian nuclear facilities.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Strikes have fallen close to the Saperizhia nuclear power plant several times since February, with Russia and Ukraine blaming each other.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Eight years after Malaysia Airlines flight MH17 was blown out of the sky over Ukraine, a result for the families of the victims.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: A Dutch court convicted three men for the downing of the aircraft, which killed all 298 passengers and crew.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Two Russians and one Ukrainian were sentenced to life in prison. A third Russian national was acquitted of the charges. Those found guilty were judged to have played a key role in shooting down the jet which was mistaken for a military aircraft. Moscow which has refused to hand over the defendants has vowed to study the sentence.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: At the moment we can say that we will examine this decision because every nuance matters in these issues.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: After studying the legal document, we will then be ready to comment on it.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The Malaysia Airlines Boeing 777 was flying from Amsterdam to Kuala Lumpur when it was shot out of the sky amid a conflict between pro-Russia rebels and Ukrainian forces.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Most of the victims were Dutch, Malaysian and Australian nationals.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: After years of investigation, the court concluded that their actions were coordinated with Moscow and that Russia provided support to the rebels in eastern Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: A spiral of violence is gripping Iran.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: It's been two months since the death of Moussa Amini sparked widespread unrest in the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The young Kurdish woman was arrested by law enforcement officers for allegedly breaking hijab rules.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Around a dozen protesters and security forces have reportedly been killed since Wednesday as the state looks to clamp down on anti-government demonstrations.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: On Thursday at least three demonstrators and two paramilitaries were killed in separate clashes, one of which broke out during a ceremony to remember four young people killed by security forces.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Human rights groups estimate at least 342 protesters have been killed in just two months.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Thousands have been injured and more than 2,000 arrested, some of whom have been sentenced to death.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: At least 21 people have been killed and several more injured after a fire broke out in a residential building in the Gaza Strip. Local sources say flames erupted at the Jabalia refugee camp after a gas leak during a birthday celebration.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Gaza's interior ministry says an initial investigation revealed large amounts of gasoline stored at the site, fueling the blaze that quickly engulfed the building.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The Palestinian National Authority has declared a day of mourning in honour of the victims.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: has declared a day of mourning in honor of the victims.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Isabella Sabor from Poland, a 30-year-old woman, died last year of septic shock while 22 weeks pregnant.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Thousands took to the streets in protest for a victim of the near-ban on abortion approved in October 2020.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Isabella's sister-in-law and the family's lawyer shared her last words with the European Parliament on Wednesday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: She said in phone messages that doctors waited for the foetus' heart to stop before treating her infection symptoms.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Isabella wrote to her family during her hospitalization that she feels like an incubator and I think she and I'm sure that she meant that nobody cares about her life that and the most important thing for everyone including including doctors in the hospital, is firstly the life of the fetus and secondly the legal situation of the doctors.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: It still remains possible to make a legal abortion in the case of a threat to the mother's health and life and in the case of rape or incest.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: But fetal abnormalities are no longer a reason to do so since the law changed, because the Constitutional Court considered it a eugenic practice.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The chair of the Committee on Women's Rights and Gender Equality in the European Parliament is suggesting a new legislative tool after coming back from a recent fact-finding mission in his native Poland.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The backlash in Poland, in Hungary and some other countries in the European Union show clearly that human rights are not for granted.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: That's why we need to create a catalogue, a systematic approach towards human rights, including women's rights in Europe. So the European Charter on Women's Rights would be an ideal tool including, for example, sexual and reproductive health rights.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Before the new law in Poland, there was an average of 1,000 legal abortions per year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Now it's down to 100 in a country of almost 40 million people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Women's rights activists say the real number is around 150,000, done with irregular access to abortion pills in undercover clinics or abroad.
